docTitle.titlePart:
An efficient Lagrange multiplier search algorithm for
Optimal Spectrum Balancing in crosstalk dominated
xDSL systems
1

byline.docAuthor:
Paschalis Tsiaflakis, Jan Vangorp and Marc Moonen
2
Jan Verlinden and Katleen Van Acker
Raphael Cendrillon

front.note:

IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications
